settings.faq_accordion_content:
Swoveralls are gender neutral, and run a tad bigger for some customers that typically wear female sizing.

The inseam:Â Swoveralls have a slight drop crotch style to them, so the inseam is shorter than a regular part of pants..but don't worry, we have plenty of tall happy folks who love their Swovies. Look at it this way, when's the last time you saw an inseam on a pair of regular sweatpants?

To find the best fit, we recommend takingÂ (at bottom of page underneath "Swove 101" ðŸ‘‡

Swoveralls are pre-washed to prevent shrinkage.

Make sure to machine wash in cold water and tumble dry on low to keep them buttery soft.

We also recommend turning them inside out in the wash to prevent pilling.

Take care of your Swovies and your Swovies will take care of you!

Exchanges for a different size or color? Free.


Returns? Just make sure the item is unworn, unwashed, and in original condition.

For U.S. returns, your return is FREE for up to 365 days if you selected one of our shipping plus options at checkout, which includes shipping protection and returns. If not, we'll still honor the 365 days, and send a prepaid label and deduct $11.99 ($9.99 for shipping, $2 for handling) from your refund.

International returns are up to the customer to ship back.

One quick note: sale, markdown, and Mystery Swoveralls are final sale.

We ship via DHL, FedEx, and USPS (you'll see which one once your tracking info hits your inbox).

We also offer low-cost shipping protection options.

International Shipping -Â yes, we ship internationally! Duties and taxes are calculated at checkout or may be due on delivery depending on your country. To see if we ship to you, just head to checkout orÂ visitÂ this page.
